title: Settings
author: Author:
confirmDeleteModel: Are you sure you want to delete this model?
confirmDeleteTool: Are you sure you want to delete this tool?
config_temperature_desc: Numerical value controlling output randomness, ranging from 0 to 1. Lower values make outputs more deterministic; higher values make outputs more random.
config_top_p_desc: Parameter controlling text diversity, ranging from 0 to 1. Lower values generate more focused text.
config_n_desc: Number of alternative results to generate.
config_stop_desc: Conditions to stop generation. For example, stop when sensitive words are involved.
config_max_tokens_desc: Maximum number of generated tokens. Reduce this value for paid models to avoid high costs. Recommended values: Math reasoning: 40000; Code generation: 32000; Creative writing: 48000
config_presence_penalty_desc: Penalty factor for repeated content, ranging from -2 to 2. Positive values reduce repetition; negative values increase repetition.
config_frequency_penalty_desc: Penalty factor for high-frequency words, ranging from -2 to 2. Positive values reduce high-frequency words; negative values increase high-frequency words.
config_logit_bias_desc: Adjust weights for specific tokens, format as JSON object.
config_replace_desc: Whether to enable the replace function.
clipboard_paste_failed: Failed to set clipboard and paste: {e}
error_api_response: API request failed with status code {code}: {text}
start_up_message: General Assistant 2 is ready! Double press Ctrl + C in a row to show toolbar.
